root.str: Enemy transport vehicle in the area.
Remove your infantry soldier's helmet. Usable by all non-Max classes.
Opponents will look to the sky in fear when they hear the tune to Ride of the Valkyries. All factions can use this gear.
This customization adds a Light Coral decal to the cockpit glass. All factions can use this gear.
*Freedom to blow things up with pretty colors and wear ridiculous outfits and probably grill some burgers, whatever you feel like.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Adds 5 rounds to the default magazine size.

Outfits can now claim a Bastion, and use it to craft War Assets!
Craft certain War Assets and you can even deploy your bastion on the battle field.
The Terran Republic has defended Tawrich!
VS - Auto-Pistol - Mid - V7 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Apply the Wave camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.
You automatically repair 2.5% health every second. Damage disables repairs for 8 seconds.
Allows for the creation of a single prowler tank in the outfitwars game mode. Usable from the home base vehicle terminals by those who have outfit permission to use the item.

We've recently lost contact with one of our couriers operating in enemy territory. We'll need you to recover this vital information and bring it back to the specified location. If you die, redeploy, or are otherwise unable to hand-deliver this data, we will view your mission as a failure.
This infrared variant of the O3 will highlight infantry at medium engagement ranges, and is useful for night-time skirmishes.
The M18 Rotary's high firing rate allows it to shred enemy fighters at short range. TR use only.
Apply the One-Year Anniversary camo pattern to your vehicle.
Acquire a Sunderer or ANT from your Warpgate
<font color="#00FFAA">Dolan:</font> As much as I'd enjoy the company, Desolation is a vacuum at the moment. Traveling through the Warpgate could have resulted in a very real, very permanent demise.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 250 rounds.
Unlock the SG-A25 with a full complement of attachments. For NSO use only.
Reduces the nanite cost of Liberator and Galaxy by 20%.
Starboard engine component has been damaged
Apply the Zebra camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
Thrown device that will create a target location for the orbital strike.

This is a Combat Medic training mission, soldier. With the Combat Medic class, equip your Medical Applicator to heal and revive fallen teammates. Your Nano-Regen Device will allow you to heal allies in a small area around you while it is active. Combat Medics are the backbone of your team, so stay close and support your allies.
Increases the top speed of the vehicle.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 250 rounds.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.75 seconds and reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 25 meters.

Hello, operative. Nanite Systems would like to invite you to participate in our battlefield mining operations. We periodically dispense an E-Drill from orbit to harvest Elysium beneath the planet's surface. When we notify you of a drill's delivery, please remain within proximity of the drill and clear the field of all encroaching hostiles. Your compensation will be distributed upon mission completion!

Participating in this mission will temporarily flag you as a High Value agent of Nanite Systems.
There has been an error. Please try again.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> I have been informed that your assistance has been requested on Esamir. Details will be provided upon arrival.
Apply the single use Esamir Ice camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Customize your Flash and tear up the roads of Auraxis with these tire spikes. All factions can use this gear.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> Thanks, friend. Glad you made it back in one piece! And not just so we could get our hands on this. Let's take a look...

<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> An assault that, unsurprisingly, is taking place right now. We need you to quickly redeploy to the front lines and demonstrate that the NS Operatives are always prepared for battle.
The Vanu Sovereignty has taken Hvar!
Customize your Sunderer and tear up the roads of Auraxis with these tire spikes. All factions can use this gear.
Spectre Cloaking makes the infiltrator completely invisible even while moving but drains nanites faster.
Order of the Dragon Armor Decal
TOP %0 MAKE IT TO THE NEXT ROUND
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 8.75%

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> I have been notified that you deployed the Storm Buoys in all required areas. Our researchers and engineers are receiving the data they need. You will receive your payment through standard channels.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 180.
TekLyte's standard reflex sight allows for superior close-range target acquisition over traditional iron sights.

Cloaks the infiltrator for up to 7 seconds. Sprint speed is increased by 20% and falling damage is reduced while cloaked. Recharges in 12.5 seconds.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Representative Nalla is located on the Atrium in Sanctuary.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 8 rockets.
Silo Reserved, Light Air Terminal Unavailable.
Reduces damage taken from small arms and heavy machine guns by 20%.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 7.5%
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.225 seconds.
Apply the single use Esamir Ice camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
Sticky Grenades attach themselves to most surfaces when thrown.

No longer functional, break down for ISO-4.
Displays a HUD health bar when aiming at at a spotted enemy. Does not show enemy shield bars. Also, increases HUD reticle IFF range.
Further increases the user's sprint speed while equipped.
What can I say - I want you to kill five dudes.
Increases the Smoke Grenade capacity to two
Damage from impacts striking the front of the vehicle is reduced.
Apply the Forest Ground camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 40 rounds.
Applies a decal to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Constructed to counter the heaviest armor, the Meteor VM4's focused plasma orb lacks the explosive component of its predecessor, but is able to damage vehicles and MAXes to greater effect.
Applies a decal to your armor. VS use only.
Apply the Shard camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 shells.
Increases the vehicle's total health pool by 8%.
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Well done, soldier. Your efforts will be rewarded.
Vehicle weapons stats, medals, and ribbons coming soon.

Unlocks Infradine for use in combat. Additional Infradine will be purchaseable through the Loadout screen.

Single use consumable. Carry 4 on the field between resupplies.
This single-use Infradine injector will, allow the soldier to view heat signatures as if they were using an infrared scope. Lasts up to 30 seconds.
Increases the vertical thrust speed of the Scythe by 12KPH.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
Only three days to take advantage of this sale!
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Uh, soldier. Diagnostics systems are online and everything seems to be normal. Clean up the graffiti with your Nano-Armor Kit or take out intruders to prevent further damage.
Your request is unable to be processed at this time. Please try again later.
<font color="#00FFAA">Dolan:</font> It's beautiful, isn't it? The maelstrom of stone and metal, suspended in time.
Nanoweave Armor is capable of absorbing more damage than its standard issue counterpart.
An airborne turbo Harasser beats a broomstick every time.
TR: MAX: Flame 01: Right Silver Medal
The Nanites live again! Check out this army of ghastly holiday items.
This Digital Snowflake Hood Ornament is a part of the Child's Play charity drive!
Allows the use of low rocket-assisted jumps with a short cooldown.
You qualify for a Double Daybreak Cash deal - 1000 DBC for $5!
Adds the Vertigo style hubcaps to your Sunderer. VS use only.
Apply the Stone Cold camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only.
Increases the top speed of the Sunderer by 10 KPH.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Prowler by 900 seconds.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 6.25%
Reduces damage taken from frag grenades and common explosions by 50%; and infantry rockets and light anti-vehicle explosives by 20%.
The Magrider is a hover tank used exclusively by the Vanu Sovereignty. Its hover capabilities allow it ability strafe and climb more types of terrain beyond other tanks.
Breaker Rocket Pods fire a volley of up to 12 unguided, high-explosive rockets. NC use only.
Activate to reduce incoming damage to the front and top armor by 67% and the side armor by 34% for 8 seconds. Can be activated once every 40 seconds.
This enhanced ABLE optic increases zoom depth by up to two times, and uses a simple red dot for close-mid range accuracy.
The duration the cloak can remain active is increased to 7.5 seconds and the charge time when depleted is decreased to 12 seconds.
Apply the Sakura camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.
Aft belly component has been damaged
Increases the lock-on disruption to 9 seconds.
Apply the Pumpkin Patch camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.

Activates a Repair Drone that hovers nearby. Friendly vehicles, equipment, and MAX units within 10 meters passively recover 40 health every second. 45 second cooldown.

Only one drone can be active at a time. Destroyed when you enter a vehicle. NSO Engineer Ability. This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Signal Scanner relay successfully deployed. Advance to the next area and continue to use the tool to find the next survey location.
The messages were not delivered in time! You will need to return to the warpgate and get a new vehicle.
The automatic SOAS-20's high rate of fire makes it an excellent choice for mid-range encounters. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 30 rockets.
Could not set the squad recruitment description due to bad player group.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 240 rounds.
Get back out there and take the fight to them! If we can lock out the others for a time it should give us the time we need to get ahead.
TR: Profile BG: TR Logo Name Placeholder
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 550 rounds.
Drive back your enemies with a swashbuckler's confidence using this cutlass-themed melee weapon. All factions can use this weapon.

The deep dive into the databanks of the two "Terraforming" corporations on Hossin revealed more information than was asked for, an outcome perhaps anticipated by at least one party. Nanite Systems quickly uses the recovered information to "fast follow" with a new prototype technology capable of sapping the Tempest energy derelict vehicles scattered throughout Esamir. Reclaiming these vehicles for further testing may yield more information on what kept them from being destroyed during the Warpgate's detonation.
Allows the user to carry and place an additional anti-personnel or anti-tank mine.

While riding in the exposed vehicle seat, you receive an additional 50% maximum shield health. Additionally, squadmates in vehicles within 50 meters of you also receive this benefit at 20% shield strength.
Increases xp gain by 50% and squad xp gain by 5%.

Water balloons approved for both recreational and combat use.

Limited event item.
TR - Pistol - Mid - V7 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Which of the following is more important to you?
The rate of fire in rounds per minute.
Personalize your Flash with custom hubcaps. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the Pine Forest camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Victory Point XP (-50% XP Pop Adv)
Drifter Jumpjets allow the user to safely glide across long distances for up to 7 seconds.
Allows players who log into the game to be automatically placed in your squad.
Increases the braking performance of the Magrider by 10%.
Melee kills with Vampire or Nightmare implant equipped.
Adds 10 rounds to the default magazine size.
We can't say we like you better than everyone else but... You know.
The M14 Banshee is a high speed gatling gun that fires explosive 14mm rounds, excellent for dealing with enemy infantry and light vehicles. TR use only.
Adds a custom rear hatch to the back of the Sunderer. NC use only.
Nanite Systems' Tetra scope gives its users a significant advantage at target acquisition at mid to long ranges thanks to its triple chevron reticule and 4x magnification.
Adds 6 rounds to the default magazine size.
Adds 15 rounds to the default magazine size.
Bug reports will not receive a response. For Customer Support please use the Ask For Help option on the Support Menu.
We have refunded the Engineer's Tank Mine to fix a medal tracking issue. You will need to repurchase this skill line.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Sunderer to 30 minutes.
Apply the single use India Scrub camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 35 rockets.
Adds a Gunport to the side of your Sunderer.
Applies a decal to your armor. VS use only.
Reload all infantry weapons faster for 24 hours. Rank 30 required.
Charges the Implant Power Module with 3600 energy.

<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> It's hard to imagine the powers capable of this sort of damage. I would caution against getting too close to the impact crater, we don't yet know what repercussions it will have on your genetic composition.
A basic frame for your profile banner. All factions can use this.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> Speak to FL-34. He awaits you with further instruction.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Liberator to 9 minutes.
<font color="#00FFAA">Archivist Dolan:</font> I've sundered Foster's communications again. I admit I have a growing taste for the act now.
The Vanu Sovereignty has defended Hvar!

Apply the Digital camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.
Adds Hubcaps to the Sunderer. NC use only.
Adds 4 rounds to the default magazine size.
Light Assault: Activate jump jets 500 times
Roll out in style with this custom rail guard for your Sunderer. VS use only.
Apply the single use Indar Highlands v2 camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
(NC)(Sunderer) Reduces Damage taken from mines by 50% and other attacks from the bottom of the vehicle by 25%
Adds 7 rounds to the default magazine size.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
Apply the single use California Scrub camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
You are already the squad leader.
The lightweight Blueshift VM5 anti-infantry MAX weapon was designed to provide increased accuracy over the standard-issue VM1. VS use only.
Increases the duration of the Gate Shield Diffuser to 14 seconds.
Deploys an Anti-Infantry Phalanx turret that may be manned by allied players.
Unable to upload at this time due to a bad connection.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Contains three implants with a chance of getting a T2 implant! Nanite Systems unfortunately can only deliver implants to one character due to technical limitations.
Increases the Smoke Grenade capacity to three
Kill enemies while wearing a holiday hat
Standard New Conglomerate Heavy Assault Helmet
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
Apply the single use Indar Rock camo pattern to your vehicle.
Attention loyal soldiers of the Republic - At 5:00:00 Auraxian time, Terran Republic High Command issued new directives to help in the war effort.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Liberator to 21 minutes.
This customization adds a Glowing Yellow decal to the cockpit glass. The cockpit glass will illuminate at night. NC use only.
Single Use Indar Scrub Weapon Camo
VS: Customization - Rocket Launcher Decimator Promo
Welcome to Auraxis. Your arrival has been communicated to our Field Commander.

Originally dedicated to medical research, Viridian Genetics shifted focus to "human augmentation" during the earliest days of the war for Auraxis before disincorporating shortly after the evacuation of Oshur. While the discovery of their underground facility creates more questions than answers, the covert location suggests illicit, if not unethical, intent. Regardless of their original goal, the intelligence held within may prove beneficial in the battles ahead.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Dolan:</font> Visit me at the following coordinates. I wish for a moment of your time.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 100 rounds.
Unlock the MGR-M1 Bishop with a full complement of attachments. For NC use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
Reduces the delay before a depleted overshield begins recharging by 100%. <font color="#dc9c36">Heavy Assault only.</font>
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12 bombs.
NSO characters can be created if you have an account that is BR 20 or above and by completing the "Job Offer" mission in Sanctuary.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6.

Deploy a temporary jump booster onto the battlefield for 30 seconds. Allies near the booster have greatly increased jump height.

Single use consumable. Carry up to 5 on the field between resupplies. This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 18 rounds.
Reduces damage taken from C4, Infantry Launchers, and Air to Ground Warheads by 18%.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. NC use only.
Illuminate the battlefield with these front-facing Shadesplitter Headlights for your Sunderer. All factions can use this gear.
The NC08 Mag-Scatter's powerful gauss-propelled shot shells and compact frame make it an excellent close-range sidearm.
Renders nearby structures nearly indestructible by quickly repairing large amounts of health. Requires a nearby Silo to power the module.
Today Only! Metallic Faction Camo Available!
Earn an Auraxium Medal on 5 different weapons.
The SCION X10 increases zoom depth to ten times that of normal sight, and is favored for long-term stakeout operations.
Must participate in the current Campaign.

Kills and revives restore 30% of your Nano-Regen Device energy, and reviving an ally increases your resistance to small arms damage by 25% for 3.5 seconds. <font color="#dc9c36">Combat Medic only.</font>
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 32 rounds.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Gold Mermaid Hood Ornament. All factions can use this gear.
TR: Profile BG: TR Logo Name Placeholder

Hello, operative. We would like to enlist your aid to deliver encrypted messages to several facilities in your area of operation. For security reasons, Nanite Systems requires these messages to be delivered via a Harasser ground vehicle equipped with an encoded short-range transmitter.

Please acquire a Harasser from an allied Warpgate, where we will equip it with the transmitter and associated messages. You will then drive this delivery vehicle within range of each of the facilities we specify. Your efforts will be compensated upon mission completion, thank you!

Participating in this mission will temporarily flag you as a High Value agent of Nanite Systems.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 450 rounds.
<font color="#DC9C36">You have selected an implant component that is currently slotted in one or more of your loadouts. It will be removed from all loadouts after crafting is complete.</font>
Detects the movement of hostile soldiers within 35 meters of the vehicle and reveals them on the mini-map for all vehicle occupants.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 2 seconds and prevents the vehicle being auto detected on the mini-map.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 81 rounds.

Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 10 shells.
You must leave your outfit before you can change home factions.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Sunderer. All factions can use this gear.

Celebrate the Sixth Anniversary of PlanetSide 2 with this decal. This decal can be applied to armor or vehicles.
This light weight material adds a layer of armor to the Mosquito that completely deflects small arms fire.
Allows the Squad Leader to place orange smoke as a rally point.
An old-war standard issue NC recruit helmet, classic in design and function. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 15 rockets.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 shells.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 25 shells.
The Hitman's high muzzle velocity gives it a significant advantage when leading distant targets.
The versatile standard-issue NC4 Mag-Shot was the first pistol to utilize Gauss technology. NC use only.
Surprise your enemies with this cackling Witch Horn for your Flash.
A special banner celebrating the 9th Anniversary of PlanetSide 2. All factions can use this item.
Republic dogs are all bark, no bite.
Depending on the weapon, increases ammo capacity per arm by an amount equal to 1 or 2 standard size magazines.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 27 shells.

Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.

The Illuminated Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. NC use only.
Allows the user to become completely invisible while sprinting.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Hey, soldier. Get back to Esamir when you get the chance. We need someone with your skillset as soon as possible.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 3 shells.

FL-34: Nice work, boyo. That data will come in handy.
(barely audible) I can't believe they actually installed the G-AMS. There's no way it'll stay that way.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 150.
Effective at shredding lightly armored targets but will do reduced damage to heavily armored targets.
The Sunderer is an armored transport capable of carrying an entire squad into battle. It can also be upgraded with a variety of support capabilities.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 150 rounds.
*These statements have not been evaluated by the AFDA. Consult a Medic before using if you are prone to radiation poisoning or other radiation-induced illness.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 20 shells.
Celebrate nine years of PlanetSide 2 with this sea-worthy bundle. Note: Bundle contains weapons and cosmetics for all empires. Boost is only available to the character who purchased the bundle.
Adds the Vertigo style hubcaps to your Harasser. NC use only.
The G40-F Ranger is an air deterrent flak cannon. It has a high elevation range and launches 40mm flak rounds that burst when near enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.

<font color="#00FFAA">Knightly:</font> When we first arrived on Oshur, we discovered unusual heat signatures scattered around the continent. This was particularly unusual seeing that no one should have been on these islands for hundreds of years.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1125 rounds.
Apply the Halftone camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
Apply the single use Indar Rock camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.

Destroy enemy construction objects near Staging Sites on Esamir

You automatically repair 6% health every second. Damage disables repairs for 8 seconds.
The Proton PPA is an effective pulsed particle accelerator plasma cannon. It has an increased rate of fire which comes at a cost of lower armor penetration.
Reduces the timer for acquiring MAX armor by 120 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 540.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Magrider. VS use only.
Makes caster immune to damage received from the front
<font color="#00FFAA">Coordinator Tolland:</font> It's been a lifetime since I've set foot on the sandy beaches of Oshur. I wonder if the water still looks the same.
Celebrate seven years of PlanetSide 2 with this limited bundle!
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.5 seconds and reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 42 meters.

Applies a decal to your vehicle. Available for all factions.
Holiday Hat NS Auraxium (not used yet)

Well if it isn't my favorite soldier of fortune, back again. Based on the data you've provided, we have confirmed that the collapse of the Northeastern Warpgate has, indeed, been the cause of the weather abnormalities in the region.
Upon being revived, damage taken is reduced by 20% for 2.5 seconds. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Crossed Sniper Rifles Hood Ornament. All factions can use this gear.
<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> Adequately done, acolyte! Now to see what lies beyond that gate.
Accept the first event and we can begin.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Chrome Nagafen Hood Ornament.
Praetor Umatherin is located on the Observation Deck in Sanctuary.
Decreases the stationary fall rate of the Mosquito by 16 KPH.
Increases the strafe speed of the Magrider by 3 KPH.
Grants access to the Ammunition Belt which allows soldiers to carry 1 additional magazine for both their primary and sidearm weapons.
Kill bounty targets with infantry explosives.
Awarded for mastery of the Galaxy, this Auraxium-infused Lumifiber trim proves its owner's accomplishments in a dropship.

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Our enemies are constructing makeshift facilities with their ANTs, soldier. We must prevent them from establishing a foothold by destroying their bases and replacing them with our own.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 42 rounds.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Harasser by 180 seconds.
Adds violet chassis lights to the under carriage of the Flash. VS use only.
Adds 10 rounds to the default magazine size.
That brought new meaning to 'hostile takeover'.
Nanite Systems' laser-assisted gunsight is perfect for situations that need a little more range than a standard reflex scope. The LANS uses a simple red dot reticule with 3.4x magnification.
Wraps your Scythe in a heavy rust trim. For VS use only.

Survey the area of Staging Site Alpha in Andvari Ruins region.

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Hope that juice was helpful. The Board are funding additional research, so they must like what they see. With any luck we'll be able to bring that battery pack into combat.

Nanoweave Armor is capable of absorbing more damage than its standard issue counterpart.

The TR will reap what it has sown.

An enhanced zoom variant of the O2, this 8x optic boasts precision in open field combat.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Flash to 15 minutes.

Further increases the strength of Nanoweave Armor.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 350 rounds.

3 second fuse.

Tech Plant benefits restock once every minute.
